verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they put out <S%H7971><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> every leper <S%H6879><s%>, and every one that hath an issue <S%H2100><s%>, and whosoever is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by the dead <S%H5315><s%>:

both male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> shall ye put out <S%H7971><s%>, without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> shall ye put <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H2930><s%>; that they defile not their camp <S%H4264><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> I dwell <S%H7931><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did so <S%H6213><s%>, and put them out <S%H7971><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, When a man <S%H376><s%> or woman <S%H802><s%> shall commit <S%H6213><s%> any sin <S%H2403><s%> that men <S%H120><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%>, so as to trespass <S%H4604><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be guilty <S%H816><s%>;

then he shall confess <S%H3034><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he hath done <S%H6213><s%>: and he shall make restitution <S%H7725><s%> for his guilt <S%H817><s%> in full <S%H7218><s%>, and add <S%H3254><s%> unto it the fifth <S%H2549><s%> part thereof <S%H5414><s%>, and give it unto him in respect of whom he hath been guilty <S%H816><s%>.

But if the man <S%H376><s%> have no kinsman <S%H1350><s%> to whom restitution <S%H7725><s%> may be made for the guilt <S%H817><s%>, the restitution <S%H7725><s%> for guilt <S%H817><s%> which is made unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be the priest <S%H3548><s%>'s; besides the ram <S%H352><s%> of the atonement <S%H3725><s%>, whereby atonement shall be made for him <S%H3722><s%>.

And every heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of all the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they present <S%H7126><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, shall be his.
And every man <S%H376><s%>'s hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> shall be his <S%H376><s%>: whatsoever any man giveth <S%H5414><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, it shall be his.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H376><s%>, If any man <S%H376><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> go aside <S%H7847><s%>, and commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass against him <S%H4604><s%>,

and a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with her carnally <S%H7902><s%>, and it be hid <S%H5956><s%> from the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of her husband <S%H376><s%>, and be kept close <S%H5641><s%>, and she be defiled <S%H2930><s%>, and there be no witness <S%H5707><s%> against her <S%H8610><s%>, and she be not taken in the act;

and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon him <S%H7065><s%>, and he be jealous of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she be defiled <S%H2930><s%>: or if the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> upon him <S%H7065><s%>, and he be jealous of his wife <S%H802><s%>, and she be not defiled <S%H2930><s%>:

then shall the man <S%H376><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and shall bring <S%H935><s%> her oblation <S%H7133><s%> for her <S%H6224><s%>, the tenth part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> meal <S%H7058><s%>; he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> no oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it <S%H5414><s%>, nor put frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon <S%H4503><s%>; for it is a meal-offering of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, a meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%>, bringing <S%H2142><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to remembrance <S%H2142><s%>.
And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring her near <S%H7126><s%>, and set <S%H5975><s%> her before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in an earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>; and of the dust <S%H6083><s%> that is on the floor <S%H7172><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> it into the water <S%H4325><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall set <S%H5975><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and let the hair of the woman <S%H802><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%> go loose <S%H6544><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of memorial <S%H2146><s%> in her hands <S%H3709><s%>, which is the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>: and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall have in his hand <S%H3027><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall cause her to swear <S%H7650><s%>, and shall say <S%H559><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, If no man <S%H376><s%> have lain <S%H7901><s%> with thee <S%H7847><s%>, and if thou have not gone aside to uncleanness <S%H2932><s%>, being under thy husband <S%H376><s%>, be thou free <S%H5352><s%> from this water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%>.

But if thou have gone aside <S%H7847><s%>, being under thy husband <S%H376><s%>, and if thou be defiled <S%H2930><s%>, and some man <S%H376><s%> have <S%H5414><s%> lain <S%H7903><s%> with thee besides <S%H1107><s%> thy husband <S%H376><s%>:

then the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall cause <S%H7650><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> to swear with the oath <S%H7621><s%> of cursing <S%H423><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> unto the woman <S%H802><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> thee a curse <S%H423><s%> and an oath <S%H7621><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth make <S%H5414><s%> thy thigh <S%H3409><s%> to fall away <S%H5307><s%>, and thy body <S%H990><s%> to swell <S%H6639><s%>;

and this water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> into thy bowels <S%H4578><s%>, and make thy body <S%H990><s%> to swell <S%H6638><s%>, and thy thigh <S%H3409><s%> to fall away <S%H5307><s%>. And the woman <S%H802><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall write <S%H3789><s%> these curses <S%H423><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, and he shall blot <S%H4229><s%> them out into the water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%>:

and he shall make the woman <S%H802><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of bitterness <S%H4751><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%>; and the water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her and become bitter <S%H4751><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> out of the woman <S%H802><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>, and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and bring <S%H7126><s%> it unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take a handful <S%H7061><s%> of the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, as the memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof <S%H6999><s%>, and burn it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall make the woman <S%H802><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>.

And when he hath made her drink <S%H8248><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%>, then it shall come to pass <S%H2930><s%>, if she be defiled, and have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against her husband <S%H376><s%>, that the water <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse <S%H779><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> into her and become bitter <S%H4751><s%>, and her body <S%H990><s%> shall swell <S%H6638><s%>, and her thigh <S%H3409><s%> shall fall away <S%H5307><s%>: and the woman <S%H802><s%> shall be a curse <S%H423><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> her people <S%H5971><s%>.
And if the woman <S%H802><s%> be not defiled <S%H2930><s%>, but be clean <S%H2889><s%>; then she shall be free <S%H5352><s%>, and shall conceive <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>.
This is the law <S%H8451><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, when a wife <S%H802><s%>, being under her husband <S%H376><s%>, goeth aside <S%H7847><s%>, and is defiled <S%H2930><s%>;

or when the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> cometh <S%H5674><s%> upon a man <S%H376><s%>, and he is jealous <S%H7065><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%>; then shall he set <S%H5975><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall execute <S%H6213><s%> upon her all this law <S%H8451><s%>.
And the man <S%H376><s%> shall be free <S%H5352><s%> from iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and that <S%H1931><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> her iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
